text:
Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills Puts a Sparkle on the Holiday Season with “All That Glitters” Package Published on : Friday, October 16, 2015
Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills is sure to glam up the holidays with the All That Glitters package for the season, including 30 percent savings on available room rates, a USD 50 credit towards dinner at the acclaimed Culina restaurant, and house car transportation in a luxurious Rolls Royce or Mercedes-Benz to Barneys New York or nearby destinations.
In addition, Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills is very proud to partner with Barneys New York in Beverly Hills. Those who book a Hollywood Suite category or above will also receive a USD 200 gift card for shopping and a certificate for two cocktails at Freds restaurant, for use at the Barneys Beverly Hills location by December 30, 2015.
During the holidays, guests will enjoy spectacular festive decorations throughout the property, and Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles is offering special culinary events for Thanksgiving and Christmas.
The Hotel’s Concierge team can also arrange packing and shipping of the gifts to anywhere in the world, with applicable shipping and postage fees. This package is valid from November 13 through December 30, 2015. Seven night advance purchase for reservations are required, with a two night minimum stay. This package is non-refundable, fully prepaid at the time of booking, and early departure fees will apply. Other restrictions may apply and offer is subject to blackout dates and availability.
Source:-Four Seasons
